cookies.message: Afrostream uses cookies for personalization, to customize its online advertisements, and for other purposes. Learn more or change your cookie preferences. Afrostream supports the Digital Advertising Alliance principles. By continuing to use our service, you agree to our use of cookies.

promo.disabledLabel: Promotional codes are not compatible with this method of payment.
promo.activate: Warning, this is a coupon that can be activated directly by clicking here

mandat.title: Make sure your information is correct
mandat.cgu:
Afrostream will appear on your bank statement 
 We will notify you by e-mail 3 days before the date of the debit. 
 A signing this debit mandate, you authorize GC re Afrostream to send instructions to your bank to debit your account, And (B) your bank to debit your account in accordance with GC Re Afrostream's instructions. 
 You are entitled to reimbursement by your bank in accordance with the terms and conditions set forth in the agreement with you. All claims must be submitted within 8 weeks of the debit date of your account. 
 Your rights to the above mandate are explained in a document that you can obtain from your bank.
